title: Video: James Blake – Lindisfarne
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/jamesblakevid.jpg "jamesblakevid")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8071-video-james-blake-lindisfarne/attachment/jamesblakevid)The video for **James Blake’s** ‘_Lindisfarne_’ premiered on [**Pitchfork**](http://pitchfork.com/tv/#/music-videos/787-james-blake/2699-lindisfarne/) a few days ago. Directed by **Martin de Thurah**, the video explores the ideas of youth, maturity and coming of age. Although full of benign imagery and delicately constructed juvenile games, there’s a darkness in this high school sleep over that’s hinted at in the most poignant of ways. The gathering descends into a hopeful yet ultimately sad ‘send-off’ tale, as we watch a vivid representation of a group of friends losing one of their own.
